text: 7|22|Atahpara se taderake prabancanara dbara adhahpatita karala. Erapara yakhana tara se gachera phala khela, takhana tadera lajjasthana tadera kache prakasa haye parala ebam tara jannatera pata diye nijederake abrta karate lagala. Takhana tadera raba taderake deke balalena, â€œami ki tomaderake e gacha theke nisedha karini ebam ami ki tomaderake balini ye, niscaya sayatana tomadera ubhayera prakasya satru?â€™
